<!-- ======== START OF CLASS DATA ======== -->
<H2>
<FONT SIZE="-1">
coreservlets</FONT>
<BR>
Class  DatabaseUtilities</H2>
<PRE>
<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html">java.lang.Object</A>
  |
  +--<B>coreservlets.DatabaseUtilities</B>
</PRE>
<HR>
<DL>
<DT>public class <B>DatabaseUtilities</B><DT>extends <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html">Object</A></DL>

<P>
Three database utilities:<BR>
   1) getQueryResults. Connects to a database, executes
      a query, retrieves all the rows as arrays
      of strings, and puts them inside a DBResults
      object. Also places the database product name,
      database version, and the names of all the columns
      into the DBResults object. This has two versions:
      one that makes a new connection and another that
      uses an existing connection. <P>
   2) createTable. Given a table name, a string denoting
      the column formats, and an array of strings denoting
      the row values, this method connects to a database,
      removes any existing versions of the designated
      table, issues a CREATE TABLE command with the
      designated format, then sends a series of INSERT INTO
      commands for each of the rows. Again, there are
      two versions: one that makes a new connection and
      another that uses an existing connection. <P>
   3) printTable. Given a table name, this connects to
      the specified database, retrieves all the rows,
      and prints them on the standard output.
  <P>
  Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages
  from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press,
  http://www.coreservlets.com/.
  &copy; 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.
<P>
<HR>

<P>

<A NAME="getQueryResults(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean)"><!-- --></A><H3>
getQueryResults</H3>
<PRE>
public static <A HREF="../coreservlets/DBResults.html">DBResults</A> <B>getQueryResults</B>(<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;driver,
                                        <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;url,
                                        <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;username,
                                        <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;password,
                                        <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;query,
                                        boolean&nbsp;close)</PRE>
<DL>
<DD>Connect to database, execute specified query,
  and accumulate results into DBRresults object.
  If the database connection is left open (use the
  close argument to specify), you can retrieve the
  connection with DBResults.getConnection.</DL>
<HR>

<A NAME="getQueryResults(coreservlets.Connection, java.lang.String, boolean)"><!-- --></A><H3>
getQueryResults</H3>
<PRE>
public static <A HREF="../coreservlets/DBResults.html">DBResults</A> <B>getQueryResults</B>(<A HREF="../coreservlets/Connection.html">Connection</A>&nbsp;connection,
                                        <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;query,
                                        boolean&nbsp;close)</PRE>
<DL>
<DD>Retrieves results as in previous method but uses
  an existing connection instead of opening a new one.</DL>
<HR>

<A NAME="createTable(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String[], boolean)"><!-- --></A><H3>
createTable</H3>
<PRE>
public static <A HREF="../coreservlets/Connection.html">Connection</A> <B>createTable</B>(<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;driver,
                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;url,
                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;username,
                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;password,
                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;tableName,
                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;tableFormat,
                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>[]&nbsp;tableRows,
                                     boolean&nbsp;close)</PRE>
<DL>
<DD>Build a table with the specified format and rows.</DL>
<HR>

<A NAME="createTable(coreservlets.Connection, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String[], boolean)"><!-- --></A><H3>

                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;tableName,
                                     <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;tableFormat,

<DL>
<DD>Like the previous method, but uses existing connection.</DL>
<HR>

<A NAME="printTable(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int, boolean)"><!-- --></A><H3>
printTable</H3>
<PRE>
public static void <B>printTable</B>(<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;driver,
                              <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;url,
                              <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;username,
                              <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;password,
                              <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;tableName,
                              int&nbsp;entryWidth,
                              boolean&nbsp;close)</PRE>
<DL>
</DL>
<HR>

<A NAME="printTable(coreservlets.Connection, java.lang.String, int, boolean)"><!-- --></A><H3>
printTable</H3>
<PRE>
public static void <B>printTable</B>(<A HREF="../coreservlets/Connection.html">Connection</A>&nbsp;connection,
                              <A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;tableName,
                              int&nbsp;entryWidth,
                              boolean&nbsp;close)</PRE>
<DL>
<DD>Prints out all entries in a table. Each entry will
  be printed in a column that is entryWidth characters
  wide, so be sure to provide a value at least as big
  as the widest result.</DL>
<HR>

<A NAME="printTableData(java.lang.String, coreservlets.DBResults, int, boolean)"><!-- --></A><H3>
printTableData</H3>
<PRE>
public static void <B>printTableData</B>(<A HREF="http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/api/java/lang/String.html">String</A>&nbsp;tableName,
                                  <A HREF="../coreservlets/DBResults.html">DBResults</A>&nbsp;results,
                                  int&nbsp;entryWidth,
                                  boolean&nbsp;printMetaData)</PRE>
<DL>
</DL>

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="right" VALIGN="top" ROWSPAN=3><EM>
<A HREF=http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0130893404/ref=nosim/martyhallsrecommA/ TARGET=_blank><B><LARGE>Order the Book</B></LARGE></A></EM>
</TD>
</TR>
